problem.markdown:
1. In the model solution provided the field start command is ----- to start the process. () Not important () Optional (x) Mandatory
2) The operation of lifting bottle platform and opening of coarse solenoid valve : () Must be Simultaneous () Coarse valve must open first (x) Solenoid valve should open after delay
3) To display no of bottles filled ----- function block is used () OND (x) CTR () Both
4) Number of Dos involved in this process () 2 (x) 4 () 6
5) Number of DIs involved in this process (x) 3 () 5 () 7
problem.p: 1. In the model solution provided the field start command is ----- to start the process.
2) The operation of lifting bottle platform and opening of coarse solenoid valve :

choicegroup.choice: Solenoid valve should open after delay

problem.p: 3) To display no of bottles filled ----- function block is used
4) Number of Dos involved in this process
5) Number of DIs involved in this process
